title: ERROR gRPC panicked! error=runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description When I check to verify that the beacon node has synced successfully to the execution node with this command in different terminal window "curl http://localhost:3500/eth/v1alpha1/node/eth1/connections" I get this error {"code":2,"message":"runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference","details":[]} the prysm terminal also shows an error that I have posted bellow in logs and after the error report the node seems to return to Finished applying state transition & Synced blocks . ### Has this worked before in a previous version? first time user. ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction ## üî• Error 



[2022-06-25 15:34:06] ERROR gRPC panicked! error=runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference stack=goroutine 12158917 [running]:
runtime/debug.Stack()

I can confirm the exact same bug.
@c0deright The patch unfortunately did not make it in time into v2.1.3. However this is indeed fixed in develop, it should be included in our next release.
